## get

Gets a candidate's detail given its id

### Parameters

*   `candidate_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[Object][38]** candidate detail with candidate_id

## get

This endpoint retrieves a list of candidate IDs from the
Candidates database

### Parameters

*   `event_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[Array][39]<[String][37]>** candidates for an event_id

## get

Lists all the comments associated with a candidate for a particular event

### Parameters

*   `candidate_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[Array][39]<[Object][38]>** a list of all comments for candidateID

## get

Gets a comment's detail given its id

### Parameters

*   `comment_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[Object][38]** comment detail with comment_id

## get

Lists all events a ClubMember is a member of

### Parameters

*   `member_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[Array][39]<[Object][38]>** a list of events the ClubMember is a member or admin of

## get

Retrieves full detail of an event given an event_id

### Parameters

*   `event_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[Object][38]** event details containing eventName, eventDescription,
eventCoverPictureUrl, eventCode, accessCode, list\[members], list\[organizers],
list\[candidates]

## get

Gets a member's detail given its id

### Parameters

*   `member_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[Object][38]** member detail with member_id

## POST/candidate/apply

A new event candidate applies to an event, backend adds the candidate to the
the candidates database along with their basic information

### Parameters

*   `candidate_code` **[string][37]** 
*   `email` **[string][37]** 
*   `name` **[string][37]** 
*   `phone_number` **[string][37]** 
*   `biography` **[string][37]** 
*   `resume_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[string][37]** unique candidate ID if the new candidate is inserted
properly, an error message otherwise

## POST/comment/add

Adds a comment to a candidate for a particular event

### Parameters

*   `member_id` **[string][37]** 
*   `candidate_id` **[string][37]** 
*   `comment` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[string][37]** unique comment ID if the new comment is inserted
properly, an error message otherwise

## DELETE/comment/delete

Deletes a comment from comments database

### Parameters

*   `comment_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[string][37]** a success status message if the comment is deleted
successfully, an error message otherwise

## POST/event/add

Adds an event to the events database, and updates the candidates database

### Parameters

*   `member_id` **[string][37]** 
*   `event_name` **[string][37]** 
*   `event_description` **[string][37]** 
*   `event_cover_pic_url` **[string][37]** 

Returns **\[[string][37], [string][37]]** candidate_code and member_code to the frontend to
be distributed to ClubMembers as well as Candidates

## POST/event/member_join

A member joins an event given the member_code

### Parameters

*   `member_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[string][37]** a the candidate code of the event if successful, an
error message otherwise

## DELETE/event/delete_member

Deletes a member from an event

### Parameters

*   `target_id` **[string][37]** 
*   `event_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **any** a success message if member is successfully deleted, an
error message otherwise

## DELETE/event/delete

Deletes an event from Events database

### Parameters

*   `member_id` **[string][37]** and
*   `event_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[string][37]** a success message if the event delete is successful, an
error message otherwise

## post

This function promotes an existing member of an event to organizer

### Parameters

*   `member_id` **[string][37]** 
*   `target_id` **[string][37]** id of the member to promote
*   `event_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **any** a success message if member is successfully promoted, an
error message otherwise

## post

This function demotes an existing member of an event to regular member

### Parameters

*   `member_id` **[string][37]** 
*   `target_id` **[string][37]** id of the member to demote
*   `event_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **any** a success message if member is successfully demoted, an
error message otherwise

## post

Deletes a member from an event

### Parameters

*   `member_id` **[string][37]** 
*   `target_id` **[string][37]** id of member to delete from event
*   `event_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **any** a success message if member is successfully deleted, an
error message otherwise

## POST/member/add

Adds a member to an event

### Parameters

*   `member_id` **[string][37]** 
*   `event_id` **[string][37]** 

Returns **[string][37]** a success message if member is successfully added, an
error message otherwise
